content.description:
This is a really nice climb.

Climb up the easy angled face for 3 bolts, and then trend right up the very shallow corner.

The climbing up the corner is fun and steep, but good flakes and ample steeming makes progress easy.
content.location: Climbs the very shallow corner at the right of the leftmost face of the cliff.

content.description: This arete is the farthest left route on the cliff.  Some slopey holds down low lead up to a face/arete.  The crux of the climb for most seems to be route finding...so I won't spoil the fun with details.

Easy climbing past 3 bolts leads to a short, steep headwall. Surmount the ledge then continue up and right on easier terrain to anchors.

Use the 5th bolt as a directional for top-roping.
content.location: Immediately right of "Watch for Rocks" and left of the tall cave feature.

content.description: Climb up and slightly left toward the crack on easy ground.  Gain the left crack and follow it to its finish, using the crack and face holds.  The moves past the crack and around the last bolt are the crux, a bit more technical.
content.location: This route is on the left side wall of a right facing corner, roughly 60' left and up the hill from Warning: Laser Beam.  It is characterized by a couple of cracks and shown as D in the Warning Signs far left routes topo.

content.description:
Climb up easy terrain past 4 bolts, gain a shelf/ledge, then continue up the beautiful face on pockets and edges.

As with Big Bird, the bottom part of this route is fair and the upper part is really good.
content.location: This route is just left of Big Bird and is marked as C on the Warning Signs far left routes topo.

content.description: Start up the corner (many variations), pass some easier ground, then continue up the short headwall.  Fun climbing, maybe slightly easier than Warning Signs: Laser Beam.
content.location: Start in the corner (slick slab on left side) immediately to the left of Warning Signs: Laser Beam

content.description:
Climb easily, trending left, passed 3 bolts on an easy angled face.   Getting into the shallow corner, and making progress up it is the crux.

Finish steeply passed 2 more bolts.
content.location: Route lies at the Left side of the cliff, just to the Right of the Arete of Laser Beam.

content.description:
Start on the right hand edge of the sandy bench, pass two bolts on easy ground to a shelf/ledge, then continue up the arete.

The bottom part of this route is fair, the upper part is really fun.
content.location: This route starts on the sandy bench just above and left of Cookie Monster.  It is marked as B in the Warning Signs far left routes topo.

content.description:
Climb up the easy angled face for 3 bolts, until a step left can be made to the forth bolt.   Pass this and make quick progress up the step wall passing the fifth bolt.

The climb is squeezed very close to Boating Prohibited, and after the 5th bolt it is hard to avoid that route.
content.location: Climbs the middle of the left most face of the cliff.
